h1: Transparency Note - The Real Context Behind the Campaign
p1: This page exists to provide full transparency for those who wish to understand the real-life situation behind my WhyDonate campaign.
p2: I share this not to seek pity, but to show the truth - because honesty builds trust, and trust builds hope.
h2: Transparency Note: My Current Medical Condition
p3: Some of the photos below may be difficult to look at. I share them not to shock, but to be fully transparent about my condition. These are recent and current images, not old ones. They depict the swelling and water retention in my lower body that made it impossible to stand, sit, or work during the most challenging times.
p4: I believe that honesty is the foundation of trust. By sharing these, I want you to see the reality I am facing - and understand why this fundraiser is truly a lifeline.
